name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
A results-driven Senior Python Engineer with 8 years of robust experience specializing in **Python**, **FastAPI**, **REST**, and cloud technologies including **AWS**. Adept at implementing CI/CD practices utilizing **GitHub Actions** and **Terraform**, along with proficient knowledge of **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for containerization and orchestration. I possess a strong track record in developing scalable, high-performance applications, ensuring seamless integration with modern frameworks and standards such as **OpenAPI**. My experience extends to utilizing tools like **LangChain** and **LangGraph** for enhancing application capabilities.

Demonstrating comprehensive expertise in full-stack development, I excel with **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **React**, **Node.js**, and **Django**, while integrating AI/ML functionalities for advanced analytics and intelligent automation. My solid understanding of microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS ensures the security and robustness of applications. I am committed to leveraging best practices in software development to drive innovation and efficiency in delivering enterprise-grade solutions.
